I've put in close to a 1000 hours in this game. I've been playing it since 2016. Never gets old.
I played CS 1.6 and CS Condition Zero as a kid and loved the gameplay. And this game just improves upon everything from those. 
It's gone through a lot of changes (eg. its F2P now, fortunately free players have separate lobbies) and yet they community still enjoys playing the game. The player base is enormous, and matches are quick to find. Servers are present almost everywhere so no ping issues. 
This game is a love-hate relationship.
9/10 will keep playing until they make a new one.
Will always be a great game
